resources.string: Tutorial Part 1\\nTo solve you have to connect all the pipes together
Tutorial Part 2\\nTouch the pipes to rotate. \\nAs you connect the pipes they will turn green
Tutorial Part 3\\nOnce all pipes are connected you win
Tutorial Part 4\\nDrag your finger if you want to move the board
Tutorial Part 5\\nYou can also zoom in and out when you pinch 2 fingers
Tutorial Part 6\\nSelect the magnet to enable auto rotate
